title: Question about oceanic week (that crab invasion thing)
body: How do we check that how many points we've contributed so far during oceanic week and when does that double IP weekend starts?. thanks

replies.body: There should be two tabs on the home client screen once you log into league. One that is an L with a circle around it and one with a crab claw. Clicking on the crab claw opens up the Ocean Hub. In the Ocean Hub on the right hand side you should see Current Battle (5 of 7) a timer and points under that you should see Cities defended and directly under that you should see My Contributions. Hope this helps.
